DOC.brief_summary: For endotracheal entubation child mostly Miller Macintosh blade use . On hand Truview EVO2 laringoscopes maintain good laryngeal view without direct sight airway without align oral , pharyngeal , tracheal ax . The aim study compare Truview EVO2 laryngoscope Macintosh laryngoscope term intubation difficulty score , time intubation intubation quality score .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Effects Truview Laryngoscopy Macintosh Larygonscopy Intubation Difficulty Score , Intubation Duration Intubation Quality Pediatric Patients Between 2-12 Years
